p: Analytical grade 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), 2,2′-azobis-2-methylpropionamidine dihydrochloride (AAPH) and 6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetramethylchroman-2-carboxylic acid (Trolox ®) (Sigma-Aldrich, Steinheim, Germany), fluorescein (Fluka Analytical, Buchs, Germany); ascorbic acid, rutin and Na 2SO 4 (Merck, Darmstadt, Germany); epigallocatechin gallate (EGCG), apigenin (≥99%) and luteolin (≥97%) (Sigma-Aldrich, Germany) were purchased. Furthermore, all solvents of analytical grade were provided by the Merck company (Germany). Spectrophotometric measurements were carried out by a UV-VIS spectrophotometer (FLUOstar Optima, BMG Labtech, Ortenberg, Germany).
